languages.text: "Потому что ты больной ублюдок — впрочем, как и все в вашей братии".
"Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."
languages.original_text: "Потому что ты больной ублюдок — впрочем, как и все в вашей братии".

traits.locale_text: "Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."
"Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."
"Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."
"Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."

languages.text: “因为你是个扭曲的疯子，和审判庭其他侍仆一模一样。”
languages.original_text: "Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."

traits.locale_text: “因为你是个扭曲的疯子，和审判庭其他侍仆一模一样。”

languages.text: «Porque ha sucumbido a la locura, al igual que el resto de acólitos».
languages.original_text: "Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."

traits.locale_text: «Porque ha sucumbido a la locura, al igual que el resto de acólitos».

languages.text: 「なぜなら、お前は病んでいて捻くれているからだ。他のアコライトと同じように」
languages.original_text: "Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜなら、お前は病んでいて捻くれているからだ。他のアコライトと同じように」

languages.text: « Parce que vous êtes malade et tordu, comme tous les acolytes. »
languages.original_text: "Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vous êtes malade et tordu, comme tous les acolytes. »

languages.text: "Weil Ihr krank und hinterlistig seid – genau wie alle Eure Akolythen-Kameraden."
languages.original_text: "Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."

traits.locale_text: "Weil Ihr krank und hinterlistig seid – genau wie alle Eure Akolythen-Kameraden."

languages.text: "Çünkü sen de diğer havariler gibi hasta ve sapkınsın."
languages.original_text: "Because you are sick and twisted — just like all of your fellow acolytes."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü hasta ve sapkınsın. Tıpkı diğer havariler gibi."
